Package viewreportscontrollers

Class CustomersReportInterfaceController

java.lang.Object
viewreportscontrollers.CustomersReportInterfaceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersReportInterfaceController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This Class is Customer report Information class for CustomersReportInterface.fxml , it runs all the methods to get data from the data base and represent it in this page Note: this class uses help from other classes
Author:
Amran
